content: Your Brand name will be displayed in invitations, notifications, and other places where your {{productName}} name is referenced.

comment.text: This translation key is used for displaying the brand name subtitle on settings pages. It should display a message explaining how the brand name will be referenced in various UI elements.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Your Brand name" is literal and slightly awkward. It would be more natural to use a possessive construction that flows better in Arabic. While technically correct, it lacks the fluency of a native speaker.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: علامتكم التجارية (ʿalāmatukum at-tijāriyyah) - This is a more standard and natural way to refer to 'Your Brand Name' in this context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'يُذكر فيها' is grammatically correct but a more direct translation of 'referenced' or 'mentioned' would improve readability.  'يُشار إليها' (yushāru ilayhā) or 'تُذكر' (tudhkar) would be stronger choices.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يُشار إليها (yushāru ilayhā) or تُذكر (tudhkar).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "adınız {{productName}} qeyd edildiyi" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey "your {{productName}} name is referenced". It literally translates to 'your name is noted/mentioned {{productName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Brend adınız dəvətnamələrdə, bildirişlərdə və {{productName}} adı istifadə edildiyi digər yerlərdə görünəcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'adınız' can be slightly ambiguous. While technically correct, using 'Brend adınız' consistently would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'adınız' with 'Brend adınız' throughout the translation to maintain consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Името на Марката ви ще се показва...' is a bit literal. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Вашата марка ще се показва...' which translates to 'Your brand will be displayed...'. While technically correct, the original phrasing feels awkward in Bulgarian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вашата марка ще се показва в покани, известия и други места, където се споменава името ви {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation keeps the {{productName}} placeholder.  It should be consistent with how the English version handles it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Keep the {{productName}} placeholder as is.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'referenced' is not accurately translated. 'erwähnt wird' is a literal translation but doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'displayed or used'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ihr Markenname wird in Einladungen, Benachrichtigungen und an anderen Stellen angezeigt, wo Ihr Produktname genannt wird.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '{{productName}}-Name' is a bit awkward. It's redundant. Consider removing the 'Name'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ihr Markenname wird in Einladungen, Benachrichtigungen und an anderen Stellen angezeigt, wo Ihr {{productName}} erwähnt wird.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Your Brand name' is translated as 'Το όνομα της επωνυμίας σας', which is technically correct but sounds slightly awkward in Greek. A more natural phrasing would be 'Το όνομα της μάρκας σας'. 'Επωνυμία' is often used for a brand's legal entity name, not the brand name itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Το όνομα της μάρκας σας θα εμφανίζεται

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Your Brand name' is awkwardly translated as 'Su nombre de marca'. A more natural translation would be 'El nombre de su marca'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: El nombre de su marca se mostrará en invitaciones, notificaciones y otros lugares donde se haga referencia a su nombre {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Your Brand name" is translated as "Brändinimesi". While technically correct, a more natural Finnish phrasing might be 'Yrityksen nimesi' or 'Sinun brändinimesi'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yrityksen nimesi näytetään kaikissa kutsuissa, ilmoituksissa, ja muissa paikoissa, missä {{productName}} näkyy.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation uses a comma before 'ja' which is grammatically correct, but a semicolon might sound more formal and polished, especially given the context of settings and brand details.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Brändinimesi näytetään kaikissa kutsuissa; ilmoituksissa, ja muissa paikoissa, missä {{productName}} näkyy.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'referenced' is translated as 'հղվում է'. While technically correct, a more natural and commonly used Armenian phrasing would be 'կհայտնվի' or 'կգտնվի' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ձեր բրենդի անունը կցուցադրվի հրավերատոմսերում, ծանուցումներում և այնտեղ, որտեղ կհայտնվի ձեր {{productName}} անվանը:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'Your Brand name' is awkward. 'あなたのブランド名' (anata no brand name) is too literal and sounds unnatural in this context. A more natural phrasing would focus on the brand itself being displayed, rather than the possessive 'your'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ブランド名が表示されます。(Brand name will be displayed.) or ブランドの名称が表示されます。(The name of your brand will be displayed.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'およびあなたの {{productName}} 名が参照される他の場所' is a very literal and clunky translation of 'and other places where your {{productName}} name is referenced'. It lacks the natural flow of Japanese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: および{{productName}} の名称が表示されるその他の場所 (and other places where the name of {{productName}} is displayed)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'および' (and) feels a bit formal and stiff in this context. A more common connector would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 、または (or)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "your Brand name" is not accurately translated. A more natural Korean translation would incorporate possessive markers or possessive particles to clearly indicate that it's *your* brand name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 브랜드 이름은 귀하의 브랜드 이름 (beulah-ui brand name) 또는 귀하의 브랜드 이름이 (beulah-ui brand name-i) would be more accurate.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The overall translation sounds slightly stilted and unnatural. The phrase "참조되는 기타 위치에 표시됩니다" (referenced other locations will be displayed) is grammatically correct but not the most idiomatic way to express the idea in Korean.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more fluid translation like: "초대장, 알림 등 {{productName}} 이름이 사용되는 곳에 표시됩니다." (Displayed in invitations, notifications, and places where {{productName}} name is used.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Your Brand name" is overly literal and slightly awkward in Lao. "ຊື່ອອງນາມຂອງທ່ານ" is technically correct but sounds less natural than a more idiomatic phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a phrasing like "ຊື່ບໍລິສັດຂອງທ່ານ" which translates to "Your company name" as a more natural alternative. Alternatively, depending on the product type, something like "ຊື່ຜະລິດຕະພັນຂອງທ່ານ" (Your product name) might be even more accurate.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow. The current phrasing feels a bit convoluted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the sentence to something like: "ຊື່ບໍລິສັດຂອງທ່ານຈະຖືກສະແດງອອກໃນບຽກເຊີນ, ແຈ້ງການ ແລະບ່ອນອື່ນໆທີ່ກ່າວເຖິງຊື່ອອງນາມຂອງຜະລິດຕະພັນ {{productName}} ຂອງທ່ານດ້ວຍ.“  (Your company name will be displayed in invitations, notifications, and other places that mention your product name {{productName}})

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'referenced' is translated as 'atsauce'. While technically correct, a more natural and fluent translation for this context would be 'minēts' or 'pieminēts'. 'Atsauce' implies a more formal citation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jūsu zīmola nosaukums tiks parādīts uzaicinājumos, paziņojumos un citās vietās, kur ir atsauce uz jūsu {{productName}} nosaukumu. -> Jūsu zīmola nosaukums tiks parādīts uzaicinājumos, paziņojumos un citās vietās, kur ir minēts jūsu {{productName}} nosaukums.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'referenced' is not ideally translated. 'Referenciado' is technically correct but sounds overly formal and slightly awkward in this context. A more natural translation would be 'mencionado' or 'citado'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O nome da sua Marca será apresentado em convites, notificações e outros locais onde o seu nome {{productName}} é mencionado/citado.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'referenced' is not the best translation for 'referenced' in this context. A more natural and understandable translation would be 'mencionado'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O nome da sua marca será exibido em convites, notificações e outros lugares onde seu nome {{productName}} for mencionado.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'se face referire la' is a bit clunky and not the most natural way to express "referenced" in this context. It's technically correct but could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Numele de marcă dvs. va fi afișat în invitații, notificări și în alte locuri unde apare numele dvs. {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ваше имя {{productName}}" is an awkward translation of "Your {{productName}} name." It implies the user's personal name is being referenced, instead of the product name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Название вашего продукта {{productName}} будет упоминаться в приглашениях, уведомлениях и других сообщениях.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Your Brand name" as "ඔබගේ වෙළඳ නාමය" is accurate. However, the subsequent phrasing "ආරාධනා, දැනුම්දීම් සහ ඔබගේ {{productName}} නම සඳහන් කර ඇති වෙනත් ස්ථානවල" is slightly awkward. It literally translates to 'Invitations, notifications and other places where your {{productName}} name is mentioned'. A more natural phrasing would incorporate the brand name into the explanation more fluidly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ වෙළඳ නාමය ආරාධනා, දැනුම්දීම් සහ ඔබගේ {{productName}} සම්බන්ධයෙන් සඳහන් වන අනෙකුත් ස්ථානවල ප්‍රදර්ශනය කෙරේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "{{productName}}" in the Sinhala translation matches the English content, which is good for consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: N/A

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'Your Brand name' is too literal. 'Your Brand name' should be translated to something more natural in Slovenian, such as 'Ime vaše blagovne znamke'. The current translation, while technically correct, sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ime vaše blagovne znamke bo prikazano v vabilih, obvestilih in na drugih mestih, kjer je navedeno vaše ime {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Brand name" as "Назив вашег бренда" is technically correct, but it's a bit clunky. 'Brand name' often translates more naturally as just 'бренд' in Serbian, especially in this context of usage.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Назив вашег бренда или само бренд ће бити приказан...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "помиње назив {{productName}}" is grammatically correct, it's wordy and slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'где се спомиње {{productName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: где се спомиње {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Your Brand name" as "Naziv vašeg brenda" is technically correct but sounds slightly unnatural. "Ime vašeg brenda" would be more common and natural in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ime vašeg brenda će biti prikazan u pozivnicama, obaveštenjima i drugim mestima gde se pominje naziv {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'referenced' is not directly translated. While 'yer aldığı' implies 'appears in', it doesn't convey the full meaning of 'referenced'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Marka adınız, davetlerde, bildirimlerde ve {{productName}} adının geçtiği diğer alanlarda gösterilecektir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'показуватиметься' (will be displayed) is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'буде відображатися' or 'з'явиться'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Назва вашого бренду буде відображатися в запрошеннях, сповіщеннях та інших місцях, де згадується назва вашого {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "được tham chiếu" is a very literal and somewhat awkward translation of "referenced." It's not the most natural way to express this in Vietnamese.  A more fluent translation would be something like "được đề cập" or "xem đến."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tên Thương hiệu của bạn sẽ được hiển thị trong lời mời, thông báo và những nơi khác mà {{productName}} của bạn được đề cập.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is technically correct but could be more natural-sounding in Chinese. "引用您的{{productName}}名称的地方" is a bit clunky. A more fluent translation might use a phrasing that implies the product name's association with the brand.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您的品牌名称将显示在邀请函、通知以及其他提及您的{{productName}}的地方。
